Interface DGItem

All Known Implementing Classes:
Potion
public interface DGItem

This is the interface that should be implemented by all items. Be creative!

Version:
0.1 Java
Author:
Evan Hildreth, root -1 Entertainment

Method Summary
 java.lang.String Name()
          Returns the item's name.
 boolean Use(DGCharacter victim)
          Uses the item on the given DGCharacter.
 

Method Detail

Name

public java.lang.String Name()
Returns the item's name. This name should be unique to any other in the program
Returns:
item's name

Use

public boolean Use(DGCharacter victim)
Uses the item on the given DGCharacter. If this method returns false, then the number of items should not be decremented!
Parameters:
victim - DGCharacter to have the item used on
Returns:
if item can be used.
